replies.author: enixlin
replies.txt_content:
op permission levels:
1. The oped player can bypass the spawn protection to build and destroy blocks.

2. The oped player can use commands like /clear, /effect, /gamemode, /gamerule, /effect, /summon and /give.

3.The oped player can use the /ban, /op, /deop and /kick commands.

4. The oped player can use the /stop command to stop the server.

當你設定好,哪些人是OP的時候
修改 ops.json 
僅修改 "level":   ,就可以修改權限
uuid以及name 不需要變更
範本格式如下
[
  {
    "uuid": "3555553-zzzz-xxxx-aaaa-96f8228ea4d0",
    "name": "1234",
    "level": 4
  },
  {
    "uuid": "c2a2d93b-xxxx-zzz-aaa-d55e861911af",
    "name": "5678",
    "level": 3
  }
]
哇，好神奇，去看看。貌似有点高级，再来弱弱的问一句，可不可以禁止op进行GM操作

官方伺服器只有預設四個等級,你可能要多嘗試
基本上不建議開3.4
1.似乎只有可以在重生點建設及破壞的權限
2.可以執行招換命令,變更遊戲模式,給予方塊等
3.可以給予,刪除,其他玩家OP權限
4可以停止服務器運作
